properties.name: api.default-path
properties.description: Default path used by all endpoints with the exception of serving static content.

properties.name: achievements.default-icon-path
properties.description: Path to the default image for an Achievement Icon. Must exist.

properties.name: keycloakrealm.master.url
properties.description: URL used by the Keycloak Admin object to connect to the Keycloak instance.

properties.name: keycloakrealm.master.realm
properties.description: Which realm should the Keycloak Admin object connect to.

properties.name: keycloakrealm.master.client
properties.description: Which client should the Keycloak Admin object connect to.

properties.name: keycloakrealm.master.clientsecret
properties.description: Secret of the Keycloak Master Client.

properties.name: keycloakrealm.master.username
properties.description: Admin username for the selected realm.

properties.name: keycloakrealm.master.password
properties.description: Admin password for the selected realm.

properties.name: keycloakrealm.userserver.url
properties.description: URL used by the Keycloak webclient to make requests connected to users.

properties.name: keycloakrealm.userserver.realm
properties.description: Which realm should the Keycloak webclient connect to.

properties.name: keycloakrealm.userserver.client
properties.description: Which client should the Keycloak webclient connect to.

properties.name: keycloakrealm.userserver.clientsecret
properties.description: Secret to the Keycloak User Server Client.

properties.name: keycloakrealm.userserver.scope
properties.description: Scope used to log in/out the users.

properties.name: keycloakrealm.userserver.granttype.login
properties.description: Grant type used during log in.

properties.name: keycloakrealm.userserver.granttype.refresh
properties.description: Grant type used during refreshing the token.
